events.message: I received the headphones yesterday but one side is broken and it's not working properly.
The customer's issue has been categorized under product defect due to a reported broken headphone side.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the case regarding the defective headphones.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your headphones arrived broken. I’m here to help you resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the broken side of the headphones so we can assess the damage?
I have sent the photos showing the broken earcup. It seems like it was already damaged before delivery.
Thank you for the photos. We will arrange for a replacement unit to be sent to you immediately at no extra cost.
I appreciate the quick response and replacement offer. Looking forward to receiving the new headphones.
The replacement order has been placed and should arrive within 5 business days. Your issue is considered resolved.
Checking in to confirm you have received the replacement headphones and that everything is functioning correctly.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for resolving my issue so efficiently.
The support case has been formally closed following customer confirmation of issue resolution and satisfaction.
